app.name: xsim
app.summary: This is a AMD Vivado Simulator integration app that implements the simulation flow in Vivado IDE to allow users to compile, elaborate and simulate a design. To simulate a design using this app, set the target simulator in the simulation settings to 'Vivado Simulator' and then click on the 'Run Simulation' button in the IDE to launch the simulation. You can also generate simulation scripts for the design in the 'scripts only' mode in which case these self-contained generated scripts can be executed in the simulation run directory. The simulation can also be launched from the Tcl console using the launch_simulation command. The list of target simulators can be obtained by running get_simulators Tcl command.
